name: A Game About Pushing Buttons And Deciding People's Fates (AGAPBADPF))
name_original: A Game About Pushing Buttons And Deciding People's Fates (AGAPBADPF))
description:
A Game About Pushing Buttons And Deciding People's Fates, or as we like to call it "AGAPBADPF". Is a semi-psychological game, you take the role of an employee whose job is to decide if people are mentally well or not.

We must talk a little with them and ask some simple questions. But you get paid to push buttons anyway, so you shouldn't worry too much.

This game was intended as a short and simple experience that would fit in with the Brackeys Gamejam 2022 theme "It is Not Real". 

Hope you like it :)


_______________________________________

Team:

- Programation and Development: Agu (Akios)

- Art and Visuals: Facu (Discord: Facu#7390)

- Voice Acting and Narrative: Pela

- Song and Sounds: Leo

_______________________________________

Aditional Controls:

Esc = Change Camera

Enter = Next Dialogue
